  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client​(java.lang.String address)
      Initializes the client object
      Parameters:
      address - : IP address of the master which the client is going to connect

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect()
      Try to connect thh client socket to the master socket

    • Answer

      public java.lang.String Answer​(java.lang.String message)
      The method ensures the communication type is TCP. Takes the string entered by the client end sends it to the master. Waits an answer for the send message and returns it.
      Parameters:
      message - : string wanted to be sent to master
      Returns:
      the answer responding to the sent message

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
      Main function called when the Client is being run, takes the IP of the server before creating an object
      Parameters:
      args -
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • Exit

      public static void Exit()
      When clients write quit or start new game, it closes the current socket and I/O streams. Initializes a new Client object if new game is wanted.
